main event: On 15 November 1957, an object was observed changing shape from round to egg shape, oscillating in a horizontal manner.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 45-60 minutes,The object was described as white and silver with a light red color,The sighting was categorized as unidentified,There is speculation that the object could be a balloon,The report includes a photograph.
sighted object: an object changing from round to egg shape
location: Not specified, Not specified, Not specified
